'''Crouching Dragon, Hidden Chi''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete ''[[The Chi of Yore]].''

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to an Oscar-winning 2000 ''wuxia'' film {{w|Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon}}.
